Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Ring
Description: Oval bezel of an unidentified profile found on the right-hand ring finger of a female skeleton. On that same finger she wore three other glass bead rings. On the left hand, which still showed traces of tattoos, were found a metal ring and a beaded ring.
